Let us help you organize your business.
Dear {!Opportunity.Primary_Contact__c}, We haven't seen you in a while. Hope you’re doing great. We are here to help you run your business with our online accounting solution, QuickBooks. QuickBooks is designed for business owners who may not be familiar with accounting. Simply enter your sales and purchases, and QuickBooks will do the rest.The benefits it provides are:
Get paid faster Create invoices, email them to customers and track payments
Save time Mobile app on iOS and Android, online banking integration and integrated payroll
Get real-time insights Monitor business performance, balance sheets, P&L and tax reports with a click
If you need any help with your QuickBooks 30-day free trial, reply to this email or give us a call at {!User.MobilePhone}. We are here to help. Ready to purchase QuickBooks? Just sign into your account and convert your free trial into a paid subscription. We are looking forward to have you in our Intuit family. Have an awesome day! {!User.Name} Quickbooks Consultant {!User.Email} {!User.MobilePhone}
